caption.title: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated knockout effects on viral replication for target genes of regorafenib/sorafenib.
caption.p: A549-CRISPR/Cas9 cells were infected with WSN for 36 h. Virus load was assessed by fluorescent focus assay. Genes selected are major targets of regorafenib/sorafenib [ 15, 16, 23]. Data represent average virus titers Â± SEM of technical replicates (n = 3).
Click here for additional data file.
